title: Welcome to Data Visualization Portfolio for Class
description: Welcome to my class blog, Data Visualization Portfolio for Class. I hope you enjoy!

title: Data Visualization 1: The Before version
description: This is the original version of Data visualization 1, before undergoing peer review and edits. There are two plots, one that shows frequency and the other that shows proportion.

title: Data Visualization 1: The After Version
description: The final version of Data Visualization 1, which combined the two separate plots into one and made a few other minor changes.

title: Data Visualization 2: The Before Version
description: This visualization displays the data from the first visualization slightly differently by using a barplot and filling the bars with the region in which the state is located.

title: Data Visualization 2: The After Version
description: The updated version of this plot shows that the highest proportion of UFO citings generally occur in Western states, but that Rhode Island takes the number 1 spot!
